flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
What you will need

  • Aluminum window mesh
  • 3 packages of artificial/acrylic hair
  • 1 pair of nude color stalking
  • Invisible thread
  • Hot glue & gun
  • Fiberfil
  • Foam-clay (for the eyes)
  • Binding tape
  • 1 yard of thick yarn
  • Iron
guide.introduction_rendered:

lines.text: The application of hair will be a little frustrating, as is tends to go all over the place.
lines.text_raw: The application of hair will be a little frustrating, as is tends to go all over the place.

lines.text: Getting the "Joey-Do" just right can be achieved by using an iron set on "low/linen". The hair may get a little sticky, but don't worry, most acrylic hair is fire proof.
lines.text_raw: Getting the "Joey-Do" just right can be achieved by using an iron set on "low/linen". The hair may get a little sticky, but don't worry, most acrylic hair is fire proof.

lines.text: Tommy's face was much easier to construct since he normally always wore shades.
lines.text_raw: Tommy's face was much easier to construct since he normally always wore shades.

lines.text: The eyes are simply made with foam-clay and then painted.
lines.text_raw: The eyes are simply made with foam-clay and then painted.

lines.text: Johnny's signature bowl haircut can be more precisely executed if straighter hair is used for his wig.
lines.text_raw: Johnny's signature bowl haircut can be more precisely executed if straighter hair is used for his wig.

lines.text: Dee Dee's faces requires substantial molding to accurately represent his facial features.
lines.text_raw: Dee Dee's faces requires substantial molding to accurately represent his facial features.

lines.text: I attempted to give his cheeks a more hollow look by adding deep creases in his face.
lines.text_raw: I attempted to give his cheeks a more hollow look by adding deep creases in his face.

guide.summary: This is a costume that can turn anyone into the famous Ramones. Why have to depend on others, when you can be a group costume on your own?
guide.title: Ramones Costume
